website_summaries.verdict: Loved for their realistic look as well as their attractive price point, these flameless candles boast some nice features.
pros: Features a convincing wax construction, moving flames, and uneven tops
Remote control has excellent range, allowing users to adjust settings from up to 16.4 feet away
Offers 4 on and off timer settings on a 24 hour cycle
cons: Comes with an on/off switch on the base that needs to be toggled on before using the remote

customer_reviews.title: Amazing candles and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in October 2017 and use them pretty much every night for 10 hours or more. Even with that much usage the batteries last for about 3 months. They have a natural-looking candle flicker and the remote is easy to use. Speaking of the remote, it recently stopped working and I contacted Antizer through Amazon. They responded immediately, and sent me a new remote along with an additional free candle! I can't say enough good things about these candles or the customer service of Antizer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Kane

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! I did NOT check the width dimensions and they are a lot more narrow than I thought they would be. They still ended up working with my space though! They have a wonderful glow!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lovan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, realistic LED candles. No one knows until I tell them that they are not real. The "wick" even flickers if you choose to have it do so. The handy little remote gives you a choice, either a "stable" wick or one that "flickers", personally, I like the flicker effect, it is more realistic. However, you do have the choice. The great little remote gives you all kinds of options...on/off, timer for 2/4/6/8 hrs, brightness level and lighted candle or not. No glass to break, no smoke, no melted wax and no hunting for matches. You will love these candles.
customer_reviews.author: AggieMomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect touch to my shelf! And I love the remote!
customer_reviews.author: ILuvMyFire

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this set- remote is bad
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced The battery in the remote three times since purchasing this candle set a month ago. At first I thought the remote have been pressed while in a drawer, and I Purchased new batteries. The batteries for the remote are not cheap. In less than 48 hours, the remote battery had died after I had only pressed to light the candles at once. Don’t get this item the remote is not good, and you can’t use the timer function or any of the other lighting functions with the candles and less the remote has power. I wish I wouldn’t have gotten this at
customer_reviews.author: SMCaudill

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and so realistic!
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles with realistic looking flickering flames. I have an old set that had no flickering flames, but just glowed with a flickering light, and these are so much brighter and more realistic! Before I discovered these, I really wasn't impressed with fake candles, but I am a convert now! These have a remote control, which makes them much more convenient. No more having to go around the room to turn them on or off. These can also be run on a timed schedule of 2, 4 6 or 8 hours. In summary, these candles are loaded with convenient features, and look very realistic. I'll be buying more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lulubeans

customer_reviews.title: Happy on one hand, disappointed on the other.
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and put all the batteries in them, and I was disappointed that one of the candles didn’t work. My husband looked at it and notice some wax residue was on the connections. He’s afraid the connections have been compromised. I hate to return them just for the one. I wish I could just get the one replaced without sending in them all, but am happy with them for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: JTrumbull

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I can have the look of lighted candles without worrying about my dog's tail sweeping by! I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these candles. They look very real! UPDATED! They burned out after two weeks....and I replaced the batteries...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Only one still working after three uses.
customer_reviews.text: We received these in late May to display on our dining table for family dinners. They worked great and looked wonderful out of the box. Unfortunately, by the second use, one candle no longer turned on (despite changing our batteries etc). By the third use of the remaining two, one kept turning off then eventually stopped working. Not durable at all and very disappointed after only three uses to be left with one functioning candle. There has been no contact from the seller (Antizer) to help rectify this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product - broken from Day One!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product - only one candle worked w/ the remote when the three candles were fresh out of the package. Now, the remote is useless and the candles randomly turn on and off - one flickers, one is a solid light and the third one dies after about 5 minutes. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: arrived intact, worked for first 3 weeks, now 4 inch candle does not work. would not buy again, cheap product. overpaid for it.
customer_reviews.author: JACKSON L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking flameless candles, but in the 6 inch candle battery compartment, the spring that holds the battery was broke off. It works if you put the tiny spring back in there, but you have to be very careful not to lose it. This is kind of a pain, because they were a gift for my 12 year old daughter and obviously 12 year olds aren't really known for keeping up with things. It's disappointing, but not worth sending back my kids birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item twice since Christmas... both times it was defective. It would not work properly with the timer as it turned itself on and off whenever it pleased. It was as though it was possessed. And, sometimes not all the candles would work in unison. This occurred WITH BOTH SETS. The light itself was quite dim. However, the candles themselves were pretty to look at . When I read the review where the comparison was made to the Luminara candle, I thought I'd give these a try. I have bought many Luminara candles from QVC. Yes, they are expensive. I guess I just found out that there are times when you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Product does NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product until one by one, the candles wouldn't work anymore after 3-6 mths. I emailed the vendor and they replaced 2 of them, but the same thing happened. When I emailed them again, I asked why this kept happening and they would not address my question and stated I would have to buy more. I won't be purchasing these again, I have had to throw them all away, even the replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tromley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: These three candles (set) came quickly and packaged neatly. I unboxed them and loaded two AA batteries in each candle and turned them on. Perfect! Exactly what I expected (for the price, a good value). They look fairly realistic and flicker as expected. However, I took the remote out, pulled out the plastic protective film preventing the battery from making contact....and.... NOTHING. It does not work. Never did. Hasn't since. I have yet to replace the battery (mostly because I refuse to pay an additional $7) but very disappointed because I essentially l have lost all the features the remote gives (why I bought them in the first place). No timer!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Bartolomei

customer_reviews.title: Ivory candles with a soft glow and stop working.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After 3 weeks two of the candles stopped working. I tried new batteries and that wasn't it. I returned them. These ivory wide diameter candles give off a yellow-white glow. Each takes 2 AA batteries and one candle was a tight fit - I had to have my husband snap the batteries in completely. The remote works from a few feet away - not the distance listed - but if you have them on a timer that isn't an issue. I have these on shelves mixed in with photos for extra light in a corner with no outlets so a lamp wouldn't work. They are perfect for the space giving a soft warm light.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: where's the light?
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had written: "these candles throw off so little light they can barely be seen. if you have any other light on in the room you won't know the candles are on unless your right beside them." However, I've come to learn, that I had only to replace the batteries. so I've added a couple of stars. but I find they go through batteries rather quickly. i'll look to estimate how many hours of actual light time I get now that I've just today replaced them all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gabie

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought I'd love these candles
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I'd love these candles, agree they are very similar to Luminaria for a much more reasonable price. They do flicker beautifully, much like real candle. All three worked fine the first time I used them. They were only left on for a short time, then I turned them on a few weeks later and only two of them worked. Tried them again recently and now only ONE of the 3 candles will light. This is very disappointing. Since they were purchased only a couple of months ago, and did work once - the issue is obviously not the batteries but poor quality in the candles themselves.
customer_reviews.author: CrossCreations

customer_reviews.title: Equal to luminara candles
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these candles!!!!!! If you've seen or heard of luminara and the price is too high for you get these you will not be disappointed. I have luminara candles and I put them side by side and you cant tell which is which. These are great quality and I love the remote timer function. These are affordable and beautiful. Ive tried others on amazon and they suck. These are the best!!!!!Now I want them to make different colors like luminara does. Please make colored ones I will buy all of them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with the purchase of the new candles! Great size, shape and design! I will be adding more to my collection in other areas of the home.
customer_reviews.author: Vroomky

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: So far the candles are performing better than expected. These were much cheaper than some of the other brands, and way cheaper than my local "Hobby" shop. The quality appears to be top notch. I will update my review if things change. The mode choices are cool. You can choose the candle effect "light flicker" in candle body, or constant light ("flame" still dances). Even during the day the candles look very realistic, and at night it's absolutely gorgeous. Of course you can expect to see the plastic flame shape piece when they are not on. But that is to be expected. I bought two sets and depending on how long these last I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Battery door won't close with batteries inserted.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether mine was a fluke, or if others have experienced this problem. The candles look great. The problem is that once you have inserted the 2 AA batteries they run on, it is IMPOSSIBLE to put the plastic piece that covers them back in place. It wasn't just me. Four others tried and said it was impossible. I returned my set after opening it because if you leave the piece off, the batteries stick out so far it is not stable even on a flat surface. I wish I had taken photos, I just didn't think of it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: That is when I noticed the flame was not on the little metal wire like all of the other sets
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many sets with various colors and the last set of the regular beige candles is made more cheaply than the rest. The top part fell out on 2 of the the 3 candles when I tipped them to put in the batteries the top “flame” part fell out. That is when I noticed the flame was not on the little metal wire like all of the other sets. The flame dances in a less realistic rythmn than the others. I am disappointed in this one set that is more cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: P. I.

customer_reviews.title: No way I would've spent this much for this lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the candles – the largest candle is dented in . This is straight out of the box – all I did was put batteries in them to see if it worked. The light shows the damage a bit better I think
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I am so surprised when I get something that is packaged well and a very nice product... Someone at Antizer Flameless Candles company cares - I will let the photos tell it all. The battery? I don't know. I just set them up and have been using them for about a 1/2 hour...simply elegant. One candle is in a lantern and the other two are free standing. I am very happy with these. Very safe over our fireplace and they look so real... lovely and thank you very much! I would recommend these...Mickey R.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Rawson

customer_reviews.title: If you squint you might see it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to compare with some Yutime flameless candles I have. The flickering motion is sorta slick. But honestly they’re so dim you have to double check that they’re really on, even in the max brightness. You can see them if the room is totally black but otherwise forget it. No illumination. The mechanical wick is a cool innovation but looks bad in the daylight so plan accordingly. Yutime ones are much brighter. Real pillar candle is brighter than either.
customer_reviews.author: G. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Remote died after 1 day, can’t control candles
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn’t open and use the candles until return date passed (forgot about them because I left the unopened package in my garage). They look cute and worked great the first day, but they stopped responding to the remote on the second. The battery might need to be replaced on the remote, but why is that when I've only used it for a minute total? Without the remote you can’t control dimmer or change from steady light to flicker. I’ll have to buy the expensive button type battery just to get the remote to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nayyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this new set.
customer_reviews.text: So, this is the third time that I had purchased this set. The ones I have in my living room for the past year work perfectly. I've had no issues with them. This new set that I purchased won't stay on!! I changed out the battery on the remote and everything. I have no idea why they won't stay on when I've never had issues with the old ones. They will stay on between 5-15 mins and then go off. It's annoying. Maybe I got a bad batch?? Or they aren't made the same as a year ago? Very frustrating, but not worth the effort and money to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing!!! The real wax I love, I don’t like the plastic led pillar candles. I love the flicker setting the look so real and the light is perfect and gorgeous! I have found these at many other places for so much more money, very expensive!! But I found them on amazon for an amazing price!!!! Thank you so much!! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service; love these candles
customer_reviews.text: The first batch of candles did not meet my expectations in terms of the time the candle would function (using 4-hour timer) on one set of three AAA batteries. The seller responded to my complaint promptly and very politely, sending a replacement set of candles with the new design which takes two AA batteries. They performed much better and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not worth the expensive price
customer_reviews.text: Much skinnier then I thought they would be. Overall much smaller then they appear in picture. But they are pretty! The candle glow looks very real with a flicker effect and the brightness can be adjusted by remote control! For the price thought batteries would be included, but no!! Took 18 AA batteries to get going, so another $12 bucks! Most flameless candles already come with batteries, not these!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week.
customer_reviews.text: The remote control worked for a week. I thought it might be the battery, but when I replaced the battery it still didn’t work. Totally bummed because the timer and brightness functions do not work without the remote. Now I can’t even use the candles unless I want to turn them on and off manually, which doesn’t work for me. It’s a shame because the candles look pretty realistic when lit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Effect I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice candles and give just the effect I was looking for, however I couldn't get the batteries to fit. I had to push super hard to get them to go in, thinking I was going to break the damn candle. Had to use a butter knife just to remove the batteries. The dimmer function on the remote doesn't work either and they randomly turn on by themselves. Scared the shut out of me one night. With all that said, I'm super excited to use these in my bedroom for a sexy touch. Even my husband was impressed! I'll be buying another set for the sconces in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: MCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Boarderline Nightime Obsession
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a couple years ago and have been happy with how they function. I purchased this second set to expand my crazy happiness for these. I thought about getting a less expensive set, and probably should have experimented, but am satisfied with these. The remote control works fine for brightness control and flicker setup, but I don't use the timer function, so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: JJ_Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you need a working timer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed candles that I could set a timer on and leave alone to turn on the next day. Everything on the remote worked including setting the timer where the candles would briefly shut off to acknowledge the timer. They would not stay on longer than 20 minutes and kept shutting off no matter how long I set the timer for. It doesn't suit my needs since the timer doesn't work. If you're looking for a set of candles with a working timer feature look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Japican

customer_reviews.title: Great candles - longevity is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these on continually for close to 2 weeks and it's still going strong. I love the realistic flicker and it serves it's purpose. I would definitely recommend these and will buy more when I get ready to decorate for Christmas again. It gives off a very nice amber glow. I am still amazed at how long it lasts! I had other tealights that don't go as long. This is a lovely well made battery operated candle. I haven't even used the remote control ---but when I do I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my centerpiece!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! I have a centerpiece for my table that had real candles that over time have become misshapen due to being stored in a hot shed during the summer. These flameless candles fill their place in the middle of that centerpiece perfectly! I never tried the timer function as I only turned them on when I was home to enjoy them. The flames actually flicker and are pale yellow in color (not orange like a lot of LED candles).
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Got to have these
customer_reviews.text: My friend got one of these as a gift, but a different brand. I looked and looked for it, but none were available. I found this brand here and it sounded the same. It has unique dancing (flames). I bought it for much less than my friend's gift was, and this has a remote and you get three candles. Much better deal. The candles can only be described as gorgeous. I am going to buy a few more sets. They are beautiful for weddings.,parties, and for home ,or Holiday use. I can't say enough about how happy I am to have these.
customer_reviews.author: Kkatydid

customer_reviews.title: Timer doesn't repeat next day :(
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered arrived and two of the candles didn't work at all. I had to return them for another set. This set works~ BUT when you use the little remote to turn them on and click on Timer / 4Hr they stay on for 4 hrs and go off.. but they DO NOT come back on the same time the next day like other flameless candles I own. This is disappointing as I don't want to bother with turning them on every night. That's the point of a timer I thought. Ugh. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kays

customer_reviews.title: Timers don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle set a few months ago and loved them so much I bought another set. This newest set, however, doesn’t work properly. I set the 4 hour timer and next thing I know, they’re all off and it had only been 20 minutes. This morning, one decided not to turn off so it was on all night long. Brand new Duracell batteries were installed in them so I know it’s not the batteries. Bummer. I’ve already thrown the box out or I’d return them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one that doesn't write reviews due to them taking time I usually don't have. But these are so amazing that I had to share. Seriously these look so real that all our guests never questioned them. Instead they kept saying how beautiful my shelves looked with "candles." At the end of the visit, I let them in on my secret ;) Once I told them they had to get close ups because they didn't believe me. I will be a repeat buyer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: My wife Loves these candles.
customer_reviews.text: I gave battery life a 5 star because the rechargables are on their 4th night at 6-8 hours a night. The other two candles have high $ disposables. All flicker. One is weaker (middle candle syndrome) than the other two, but still flickers. Overall appearance of the candle is very satisfactory. Really, for the price we are very happy with these candles. Hopefully they will survive though the holidays and perhaps the winter (ours are very short here). And yes, my wife loves them!
customer_reviews.author: B. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Defects
customer_reviews.text: I mean.. I like how it looks, flickers and can be controlled by a remote but there are things I dont like. So these are suppose to take AA batteries but it doesn't work and once the batteries were placed in, it was so hard to take out that I have to slam it against something in order for it to pop out. So I put in the AAA batteries and it works? Weird. Although the AAA batteries work, I don't like how it don't hold the battery securely.
customer_reviews.author: Xen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have only had these for one week. I appreciate all the other reviews that guided me to buy this product. I have Luminara and Mystique candles and they are both good, but these are terrific for half the price. I like the different options on the remote which the others do not have. I agree that the candles which use C or D batteries will last longer. All that means is that you may need to change these more often We'll see. I am ordering another set, and I think these would make great gifts. I also saw these same candles are available on Amazon in red.
customer_reviews.author: Type Four

customer_reviews.title: Realistic enough; quality control is questionable
customer_reviews.text: All three of mine lit up on arrival, but once of mine (the tallest one) has a hard time getting its "flame" to wiggle. It doesn't really move that much so I'm stuck with one of my candles looking a bit out of place since the light glows but the "flame" doesn't move. Not a huge deal though, and I like everything else about these.
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: OK PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ORIGINALLY BOUGHT THESE FOR OUR PATIO OUTSIDE BUT FOUND IT GETS TOO HOT AND WILL MELT THESE, THESE HAVE A FILM OF WAX ON THEM AND NOT HARD PLASTIC WHICH I WANTED FOR OUTSDIE ON THOSE HOT SUMMER EVENINGS TO DECORATE THE PATION ALONG WITH OUR NEW RED PATIOS UMBRELLA BUT I DONT THING THEY WILL SERVE THE PURPOSE SO IAM USING THEM IN THE LIVING ROOM NOT MUCH LIGHT NICE COLOR.
customer_reviews.author: BECA G

customer_reviews.title: Still Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these Antizer flameless candles that I've bought and I am still amazed by the price point and how fantastic these things are. Forget the Luminara brand. These are about as good a duplicate for those as you can get. The remote is reliable and you can tone down the brightness to a more mellow glow, or really light up a space with their beautiful flickering light. I just love them and can honestly say I'll probably be buying a third set again sometime.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lemons.
customer_reviews.text: One of the candles was basically shattered. I like that they’re real wax but probably should account for that in shipping so they don’t arrive in pieces, the box didn’t appear damaged what so ever so seems like it happened before shipment. Also double A batteries do not fit though that’s what’s required. They go in far enough that the candle will turn on but not far enough to close the lid. I will say the one I turned on looked nice but frankly even if they weren’t broken, the battery mishap is enough to send um back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept though and I hope they don't stop working ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the candles at the top came out of the package broke. It seems to be real wax so I got a lighter out and melted it back together however it came packaged very well. So was it just poorly made? Great concept though and I hope they don't stop working like the others here have said.
customer_reviews.author: carrie sermersheim

customer_reviews.title: One didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t worth my time to return these, but it should be noted that one of the candles I received didn’t work at all. The battery compartment was not installed correctly and would not hold one of the batteries. I could probably fix it but I’m not going to bother. The remote function is nice. We put these in hurricane glasses on our mantle and they look fantastic. Just wish they were the same size, and wish the third one worked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Just like Luminara! But Affordable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love these candles! I'll be honest, I was watching QVC all morning and almost paid $90 for their 6 count Luminara candles 🤦‍♀️ These reflect off the wall and look real. I love that you can dim them, and select whether you want them just to light up or have the candle effect. I will be ordering more for gifts soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great candle option without the fear of fire
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our camper when we were stuck in a nonelectrical sight. I wanted something that would provide a warm light to be able to navigate around the camper without being blasted out by a harsh “cool light”. Also real candles are kind of a bad idea in a camper. This did the trick. Very soothing flicker too. I loved the remote control and the three different timers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Luminara Look-alike
customer_reviews.text: I have some Luminara candles at home which I love but the price is too steep for me to get more. I was pretty surprised how great these are next to them. I’ll be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Really pricey considering the remote control only operates when the candles are turned over ! What is the point of having a remote useless ! Also made in China !
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Color of flame.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these many times and given many as gifts. The last ones I just got now take double a batteries instead of triple a which is fine. The PROBLEM IS NOW FLAME HAS AN ORANGE GLOW I HATE. WHY CHANGE FLAME COLOR? Very disappointed. I guess I’ll send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED candles
customer_reviews.text: These birch LED candles are really cool. Very happy with purchase. Very realistic. Wife loves them. We have them all over the house in groupings and they come on in the evening. These were a good price point too. Each takes 2 AA batteries so you better grab the value pack at Sams or Costco! They should last for a year I imagine though.
customer_reviews.author: B C Berger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Look Surprisingly Real
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice flameless candles! They look surprisingly realistic and give off a soft, warm glow that makes my room feel so lovely and inviting. I have mine on some faux mercury glass pillar holders that I bought here on Amazon and they look so chic on my fireplace mantel. If you don't like the risk of real candles or you're not allowed to have them in your living or work space, get these.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I still can't justify paying $40 for one candle - even if they are beautiful. Husband is very happy with them - I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: They are as many people said, quite orange looking. Using reusable batteries with them - goes thru the batteries within less than 12 hours. Since it's getting dark so early, they're set to go on at 5pm and go off at 11pm. The timer function doesn't work when battery life wears down to a certain point and they get darker and darker. Even though they're quite orange, I still can't justify paying $40 for one candle - even if they are beautiful. Husband is very happy with them - I'm just a little pickier :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these were better than expected! Very realistic candle affect, even when pretty close to the candles. They have such a cozy affect and I'm mesmerized by the lights dancing on the ceiling in a dark room. Was concerned that they would not be attractive in the day time and not on, but they look nice even then. Love that there is a remote, which includes a timer. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LAM2lake

customer_reviews.title: Great for subtle lighting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after scraping some wax off furniture using real candles. They provide a wonderful glow and the flames look so realistic. We keep the remote by the nightstand. I never realized it was an inconvenience getting up to light candles until I had the wonderfully swarmy ability to light them from the comfort of my bed. I’ve had them for a couple months, and so far so good. Still on the first batteries. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth Twice what they cost !
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these. The timer function works perfectly and I love how the flame flickers. I still can't believe the quality and the price. They were packaged in a really nice box , so would be great to give these as a gift. The remote control is very handy . The remote will control each separately when you point at each candle. I didn't think I'd use the remote but it's become my favorite thing because I can put the candles in hard to reach places now.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Its okay...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go on a floating shelf over my bed. So its not something I can easily just grab and manually turn on. So having a remote it nice. I like the flicker option as well as the option to control the brightness. The only downfall to this product is that my timer doesn't work very well. I had it set on the 4 hr function and sometimes after 45 minutes it will turn off, or 1.5 hours.... never has stayed on the full4 hours which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Foster

customer_reviews.title: They look so real!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these candles! Very nice quality and look and feel so real! They’re made out of real wax and they “flicker”. They do require AA batteries (2 in each candle) and the remote doesn’t require any batteries. The remote is simple very easy to use and a nice feature too is you can dim/brighten these candles. They make a very nice display on my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Batteries constantly corroding in candle bases, only useful if you take the time to remove the batteries after every use, and only put them back when you're ready to use the candles. The continuous use of the batteries is MUCH less than advertised. Overall, a disappointing item that does not live up to it's advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioTgr

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set of these and liked them so well that I bought three more. One is for a gift. I have the more expensive ones and these are so much better........more realistic and they're dimmable besides. They also come with a remote - no need to pay extra for it. They are a little thinner in diameter than the pricey brand but that doesn't deter from their beauty. Most folks would not even notice. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: These candles seemed great at first. However, after just a few weeks or use, the light function no longer works. I've replaced the batteries multiple times thinking it might be a battery issue, but the candles are completely defective. I wish I could return these - definitely not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles have been going strong for 6 months in my home and are used every evening. The remote makes adjusting the light and flicker a breeze. Very realistic look to candle and light output. They are durable unless dropped (the bottom will crack and fall out, but the candle will still function) I love these and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nice light and realistic enough
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for just over a week and have set and re-set the time feature several times (not because it wasn't working, but just to get them to go on when I really want them to - i.e. earlier rather than later). The remote is super easy to use and the candles look every bit as nice as the expensive name brand one my mom bought me. They put off a nice amount of light and make for a warm and cozy feeling environment without the worry of burning down the house. So far I'm very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Flameless, but looks like a candle burning...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!!! When I first opened them, I thought “they feel like real candles, but this flame looks super fake.” Oh, was I sadly mistaken by the flame. When the lights are low and you are sitting back watching the flame you can’t tell that a real candle is not burning! Great buy and remote function is a great addition!
customer_reviews.author: Cdiva

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles!
customer_reviews.text: These faux candles are great! They flash like real candles or you can adjust them to use just for a light...the remote makes it very easy to use. I almost bought some similar at Bed, Bath and Beyond but they were selling their candles for over $50 a candle! The only thing I notice, 2 candles are a yellowish glow (more realistic) and the 3rd candle is more whitish glow. So they don't all match in glowing but still very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Provide a nice effect that is fairly realistic. They will melt, though!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boat since I like the atmosphere candles provide, but I don't want open flames. They work very well in that regard and I am very happy with them. Keep in mind that they are made of wax and will "melt" (deform) if exposed to high temperatures for extended times. The pictured set was on my boat all summer where the temperatures would reach 110 degrees when it was all buttoned up for the week while we were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Edit your Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY MELTED- DO NOT USE OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: Loved these candles. Bought for my outside lantern. After only a few short hours on day 1 they were melted down to wires and huge hunk of plastic like wax. Had to return- very disappointed. DO NOT USE OUTSIDE Not sure now what to put in my OUTDOOR lantern lol
customer_reviews.author: B. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. I like the remote and the variety of settings. These had a flame shaped bit of plastic and a light that moves to illuminate it. Not a bad looking candle, I only wish it wasn't cut so low on the lowest part of the lip. It accentuates the fake look of the flame too much. Not bad for an area no one will be looking at too closely though.
customer_reviews.author: Bluskyz

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous realistic flickering candle! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These candles are absolutely gorgeous! I have had many battery operated candles in the past & these are the most beautiful & realistic looking that I’ve ever seen. They are dipped in wax so it makes them look even more realistic and the flickering of the flame is so beautiful. It gives a great soft Amber lighting to the room. The picture doesn’t do it justice. Just get them! They are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: WoodlandFairy

customer_reviews.title: Just like Luminara
customer_reviews.text: I have a Luminara candle that i was gifted and I love. However, when looking at buying several candles, I did not want to pay the hearty price. These candles are so comparable. The ONLY two differences are as follows: 1.) the timer function relies on a controller, versus a switch on the bottom of the candle. The only risk with that is if the controller dies, so does that function. 2.) these candles use two AA batteries versus the Luminara 2 D batteries, so they do have to be replaced much more often. The nifty thing is, with these, you can control brightness, length of “on” time, candle vs light function, etc. overall, amazing value for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only if you like burning through batteries
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these, especially since they are thinner than most LED candles. I liked getting a collection of different sizes all together. I liked the look of them when lit. The likes stop there though. I have several different LED candles that I've bought over the years and I've never seen any of them burn through batteries like these do. They burned through 2 sets of brand new AAs in about 1 week. I also tried rechargeable batteries and they burnt through them in a week and a half. I don't know what these LED candles are doing but it is ridiculous. Seriously disappointed, would never, ever, ever buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: droller

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, DRAINS BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 sets of these. They look great, work great, love everything about them except that they drain all life out of batteries in about 3 weeks no matter if the LED is even on. This means while "on" is pushed on the candle, turning the light on or off with the remote is meaningless to the battery, it will still drain. I manually turn each of them on when i want to use them so as to not go through 12 double A's at least once a month....
customer_reviews.author: legendovlink

customer_reviews.title: When I was young and dumb, I thought to myself
customer_reviews.text: When I was young and dumb, I thought to myself, why would you buy fake candles? Just buy real ones! Then I got pet birds. These are pretty good; not great. The light is slightly too amber/orange, and the flickering not random enough. They look pretty good if you turn the highest part so you can't see the "wick/flame", or if they're above your head. The biggest giveaway is the reflected light on a wall/surface -- it doesn't look right. Also, they suck up battery pretty fast. That being said, I'm pretty happy with the atmosphere they give, and they were great during Halloween -- it's nice to set a timer, rather than worrying about blowing out candles!
customer_reviews.author: akh

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I really like these. Very beautiful. A couple of things I don’t like is every time you turn them on you have to hit the candle button on the remote so they flicker like a candle. The other is 5 of them turn off automatically turn off after about 30 minutes. I might try to contact the seller about those. Other than that the are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: KevinSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Skinnier than perceived
customer_reviews.text: The scale seems to be a bit off. They are too tall for their diameter. They could have been 'plumper' and shorter. Still all in all they look nice grouped. Oddly they provided two remotes (in case of loss?). To activate via remote you do have to point remote at them from overhead. If aimed from side not all of them will light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeani

customer_reviews.title: Worthy product- Worthy price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fill in my faux fireplace I had built. I love that these candles are so versatile! I can go from bright to dim, candle lit to candle flame function in a matter of a moment with the remote control (which they give you two) and the set timer ( turn candles off in hour increments) Love these and I get many compliments! It’s been a month and I have used these candles every night!! Worth the money! No complaints !!
customer_reviews.author: Sia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same effect without the smoke or flame
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I love them. Perfect for our home. We have small grandchildren and actual flames would be a hazard. These candles fool everyone...they look exactly like burning candles. Batteries last forever and the soft glow flickers. Even a remote to adjust the brightness and timer. I am 100% happy about the purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeka Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the remote to work which was unfortunate, but overall I really like these candles. I have cats that like to get up on shelves and counter tops which make traditional candles unsafe, these candles are a fantastic alternative. They provide beautiful light and look like real flames in the dark. They are quite beautiful and not nearly as expensive as other brands. I plan to buy more as soon as I can find room for them :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure I would like this but ended up loving it.
customer_reviews.text: When first ordered I wasn't sure how I would like the battery operated candles. The timer makes it wonderful. They come on every night at set time and go of at set time. No worries about turning the on and off or anything else. They could be a little brighter but I am pretty much satisfied with them as is.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun H

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Like a real candle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the great reviews I was very skeptical but when I received them and tried them out for the first time at night I was truly amazed. Here are the highlights: remote control controls on/off and dimming, the candle actually looks and even feels like a real wax candle, the flame flickers and move light a real candle light, the dim has a broad range to set the perfect ambience, has a sleep timer for different durations. I probably will buy more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Realistic moving wicks
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the options with these candles. Using the remote you can set them to shut off after select periods of time, you can have them glow like a candle or have a steady light. They look real from a small distance with the moving wicks and you can’t beat the price compared to another brand I’ve bought in the past. My sister was so impressed she ordered some right after she saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love very realistic hubby think so too!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic. Wax base around the whole candle. They each take 2 AA batteries. I like this better than the clock batteries because they last longer. I used to buy them at pier 1 and these will be the one I will be buying from now on because they are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Do not work well.
customer_reviews.text: The candle set is very pretty and looks realistic when on, and even has the sound of a flame when near you, however, the candles do not stay on, even with new batteries, and/or one or two will go out, or all three, without even using the remote control that goes with them to shut them off and on. The remote control works well if the candles are close-by, but from a distance not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Munro

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I was happily surprised at how these look and operate! LOVE THEM! I'll try to add a picture later, but I've had these on all evening for the past 4 evenings and batteries are still going strong. I chose the red candles hoping they weren't too red and they aren't, they couldn't be better! Need to buy some white ones!
customer_reviews.author: 3barpenney

customer_reviews.title: Best flamess candles ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best candles I have ever purchased and I have purchase quite a few. So realistic looking and has a nice a nice warm light. Got so many compliments from friends. I purchased two sets and so happy I did. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah826

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft “flickering” candlelight glow
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT for soft candlight “flickering” glow during relaxing bubble baths, in the family room, in the bedroom, or in the hotel room. We bought one package of 3, but I would love to have purchased more than one pack. The remote control with timer and optional brightness scores this product a full 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Realistic!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and the remote control is easy to use. The timer works great ; one can pick time slots: 2H, 4H 6H or 8H, as well as change the intensity of the light. They can be propped anywhere out of the way and remotely controlled. In my house, there are cavities where the exposed ceiling joists meet a main beam and I have placed some candles in there, see photos.
customer_reviews.author: NaT

customer_reviews.title: Great looks great value but be warned may have timer issue
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best looking flickering candles, better than Luminara, however.....I purchased two sets. One of the candles sometimes won’t turn on via timer like the others. I have to reset remote when that happens. Very bright real looking and lights up most of the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Half Pint

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a 7 pack instead of the 9 pack I ordered. The candles are CHEAP... I opened a feesh pack of AA batteries and tested 2 candles, which didn't work... at that point I just packed the box back up and I'll be returning this. A total waste of my time. On a plus note, there were 2 remote controls in the package... they didn't mke the candle work either!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on tables at a banquet we hosted at our lodge. Beautifully made. Worked great, got lots of compliments. Will see if they last. Since they are wax be careful to put them/store away from heat.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.. when the work
customer_reviews.text: I received these frameless candles and was extremely happy with 2 of the 3.. they look very nice except one of the candles doesn’t work. Returning items is a pain in the rear- so my frustration is the reason for 2 stars. If I were to have received 3 working candles, it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly13

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these candles. They are slim, but when they’re grouped together they look great. The functions on the remote make using them easy. You can brighten or dim. I also like the flame or flameless light function. I’ve used the timer and it worked perfectly. All in All, very nice for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality candles for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very good quality. They only take AA batteries and they need replacing more often if you have them on a timer every day. (I have set for 6 hours) I love flameless candles and added these to several I already had, they create a nice look in my living areas in the evening. I’ll be honest - these are not as bright as my Luminara candles but they do look very similar.
customer_reviews.author: FLMom

customer_reviews.title: very realistic
customer_reviews.text: I just opened these and so far so good. I had to return another brand for lack of function but I couldn't be more thrilled with these. Very realistic. Love the flickering, moving flame. I'll post an update as I see how the timing function works and how long the batteries hold up.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable and work well. They came in looking just like the picture. I don’t typically use the timer function or adjust the brightness, so I can’t say whether or not they’ve held up in that regard (but it did definitely work the first day I had them). Interestingly, my TV remote can turn them off, which is comical since they sit on my mantle near the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Jones

product_meta.title: Antizer Flameless Candles 4" 5" 6" Set of 3 Ivory Dripless Real Wax Pillars Include Realistic Dancing LED Flames and 10-Key Remote Control with 24-Hour Timer Function 400+ Hours by 2 AA Batteries
feature_bullets: 3-PACK SET includes a 4” pillar, a 5” pillar and a 6” pillar (each 3.25” diameter), 1 remote control and an operating manual. Batteries are NOT included with this product
GENUINE PARAFFIN WAX CANDLES with realistic dancing LED flames let you add a festive or romantic glow to any room safely, even in the presence of small children and pets
FLICKERING FLAME TECHNOLOGY creates the illusion of real flames. Each LED bulb delivers 50,000 hours of lamp life. Use of 2 high-grade AA batteries that will provide 400+ hours of continuous ambience
10-KEY REMOTE CONTROL with 16.4-foot range lets you display candles in hard-to-reach places. Timer feature lets you schedule your candles in 2-, 4-, 6- and 8-hour increments, cycling every 24 hours
SMOKELESS AND DRIPLESS CANDLES with smooth, classic ivory color are ideal for bookshelves, bedrooms and as safe focal points in holiday wreaths and centerpieces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,332 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
